title: 16-Year-Old Critically Injured In Accidental Shooting
content:
MEMPHIS, TN -(localmemphis.com)
A 16-year-old was shot in the 3400 block of Dupre Street, according to Memphis police.
Officers said the shooting happened just before 8 p.m.
The victim was rushed to the hospital in critical condition.
There is no suspect information at this time.
